title: The Way of Miracles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/17/21
itunes:title: The Way of Miracles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/17/21
description:
George Noory and researcher Mark Mincolla explore his work on human consciousness, and how faith, prayer and a positive attitude can create miracles that will make a lasting change in your life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
